Pre-Game Insights: Kane Williamson-led New Zealand is currently leading the chart with three points and +4.450 net-run rate.
New Zealand looks formidable against Sri Lanka.
Kane Williamson-led side is riding high on confidence as they crushed defending champions in the opening game and will look to continue their red-hot form in the tournament against Sri Lanka.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sydney Cricket Ground provides great edge to the batters and close to 180 can be expected score from the team batting first.
The surface also provides true pace and bounce, and bowlers will need to ready themselves well to make a mark in the game.
